thread.title: Army axes their daredevil White Helmets bike display team
thread.title_full: Army axes their daredevil White Helmets bike display team

title: Army axes their daredevil White Helmets bike display team
text: comments They have thrilled millions across the globe for decades with their daredevil displays – but the British Army’s White Helmets motorcycle display team is being axed for being ‘out of date’. Formed in the 1920s, the 30-strong display team from the Royal Corps of Signals is viewed by senior officers as not representative of today’s high-tech Armed Forces, according to insiders. The British Army’s White Helmets motorcycle display team is being axed for being ‘out of date’ RELATED ARTICLES
